msItem.title: Mura'at-namah.
msItem.note: F1a. Signature of Ellis with date 11.4.12 Last folio, verso. Signature: E.D. Ross. (Edmund Denison Ross.) A eulogistic notice of the appointment of Thakur Das Ji as Divan of Kahmir by Maharaja Ranbir Singh and some of his administrative acts. To some extent based on documents. Possibly never fully completed.. Author is one of the scribes of Thakur Das Ji, Divan of Kashmir, very possibly Kirpa Ram. Coarsely illuminated initial opening and illuminated borders throughout.

bindingDesc.p: Red leather binding, presumably Kashmiri, with inset stamped panels. Loose.

origin.p: Kashmir. 19 Puh (Push?)1924 Samvat era in final colophon, 9 Sawan 1925 some folios earlier.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
